mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, PHONE, EMAIL, ROLE, CREATEDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM TB_MEMBER
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER (ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE, ROLE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phone}, 'USER', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
